EriadDialogue: ^COSMO: Okay WOW that’s a lot of excitement...
^ERIAD: Hahaha! Sorry!! I just really love the whole festival vibe!!
TheRest: ^CIELLE: I really like all the decorations everywhere and seeing all sorts of different people all in the same area... It feels very inviting!
^ERIAD: I just think it’s great that we all come together every cycle around the sun for ten passing moons to celebrate the one thing that started it all!
^COSMO: Oh? What’s that one thing that started it all?

^ERIAD: Oh where’s the fun in me telling you? There’s a bunch of information scattered all around the market grounds! Be sure to look at any posters, pamphlets, books or anything else that looks legible.
^COSMO: I mean, I’m not mad about us having to look around the festival some more. As you said Cielle, it is quite nice here...
^ERIAD: This festival is celebrating our history, so go out and experience it yourself!
